sn7.19:4.2: Atha kho mātuposako brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.19:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn7.19:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho mātuposako brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.19:4.6: “ahañhi, bho gotama, dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesāmi, dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā mātāpitaro posemi.
sn7.19:4.7: Kaccāhaṃ, bho gotama, evaṅkārī kiccakārī homī”ti?
sn7.19:4.9: Yo kho, brāhmaṇa, dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesati, dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā mātāpitaro poseti, bahuṃ so puññaṃ pasavatīti.
sn7.19:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, mātuposako brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.19:6.2: “abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama … pe …
sn7.19:6.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
